ruleset.name: Padawan Rules
ruleset.description: The Padawan Ruleset contains a collection of rules taken from Padawan.

rule.name: EmptyTry
rule.description: Empty try{} statements make no sense.

rule.name: EmptyCatch
rule.description: Empty catch() statements can defy the purpose of try/catch.

rule.name: IncludeRequires
rule.description: Using unfiltered input from external sources can lead to security holes.

rule.name: IncludeFunctions
rule.description: Using unfiltered input from external sources can lead to security holes.

rule.name: Exec
rule.description: Using unfiltered input from external sources can lead to security holes.

rule.name: Define
rule.message: Avoid define() with variables instead of constants/literals.

rule.name: Loop
rule.message: Avoid function calls in loop expressions.
